column4: before I bother asking the actual question; is anyone here familiar with the ati fglrx video driver stuff on hardy?
Are you sure that you are actually using fglrx currently ( if it won't load it may default back to vesa )
You should not have to, X should do that
when i used to do an lsmod it would show fglrx either way
Before you install fglrx you are going to be using either "ati" or vesa
BTW, your posts to me will only be highlighted in my client if you use my full nick ( use tab completion )
Yes, to use the open source ati driver set your xorg.conf to use Driver "ati"
I'm going to retry that again; though I had poor luck last time.  That should use dri and support aiglx right?
i'll be back; thanks for the help so far
should lsmod still only find "video" tho?
in any event; I guess the next thing I need to do is try to enable dri
cool; i got the fglrx driver working; and aiglx is working too... only problem is that xrandr is reporting a resolution of 1400x1050 as max
